original_text: And he brought out the people who were in it and set them to labor with saws and iron picks and iron axes and made them toil at the brick kilns. And thus he did to all the cities of the Ammonites. Then David and all the people returned to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 그 안에 있는 백성들을 끌어내어 톱질과 써레질과 철도끼질과 벽돌구이를 그들에게 하게 하니라 암몬 자손의 모든 성읍을 이같이 하고 다윗과 모든 백성이 예루살렘으로 돌아가니라

sentences.original_text: And he brought out the people who were in it
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 안에 있던 사람들을 끌어냈고

sentences.original_text: and set them to labor with saws
and made them toil at the brick kilns
And thus he did to all the cities of the Ammonites
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이와 같이 암몬 사람의 모든 성읍에 행했고

sentences.original_text: Then David and all the people returned to Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 다윗과 모든 백성이 예루살렘으로 돌아갔다
